name: Mathematical Puzzle Set
detail-description: The Mathematical Puzzle Set includes various brain-teasing puzzles and games to enhance mathematical thinking skills. It's suitable for kids aged 8 and above.

name: Microscope Kit
detail-description: The Microscope Kit is a complete set for young scientists to explore the microscopic world. It comes with slides, specimen samples, and adjustable magnification for exciting discoveries.

name: Build Your Own Robot
detail-description: The Build Your Own Robot kit allows kids to assemble and customize their own robotic companion. It introduces basic engineering concepts and coding skills in a fun and interactive way.

name: Number Board Game
detail-description: The Number Board Game is an educational and entertaining way to learn basic arithmetic operations. It's suitable for kids aged 6 and above and can be played with family and friends.

name: Chemistry Lab Set
detail-description: The Chemistry Lab Set includes a range of chemicals, test tubes, and equipment for safe and exciting experiments. It's perfect for young chemists who want to explore the world of chemistry.

name: Remote Control Car Kit
detail-description: The Remote Control Car Kit allows kids to build their own remote-controlled car and learn about electronics and circuits. It provides an exciting hands-on experience in engineering.
